import React from 'react'; import $ from 'jquery'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import '../Style/Home.css'; class Home extends React.Component { componentDidMount() { const MainWord = document.querySelector('.jump'); const text = MainWord.textContent; const jumpLettersArray = [...text] const getLetterHTML = jumpLettersArray.map(letter => `${letter}`).join('') MainWord.innerHTML = getLetterHTML; } render(){ return(
